title: Champions that you fear the most.
body:
Like when you look at the loading screen and you see a champion like  {{champion:55}}  and you begin to fear the worst.

As a person who likes playing ADC alot, I'd go with {{champion:89}} . I hate her .-.

EDIT: Decided I hate {{champion:429}} more.

replies.body: Bill from accounting.
%%%%ing Bill.

There is nothing to fear but fear itself!
In this case:
Fiddle's Terror.
Shaco's Jack 'n the boxes.
Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror.
Hecarim's Ultimate.

They are all pretty %%%%ing scary to be honest, one of the worst CCs next to knockbacks and knockups.

{{champion:30}}  I always know that I will just make it out of a teamfight with low as %%%% health just to have karthus ult and get a triple
{{champion:72}} {{champion:254}}  bye bye ADC
{{champion:55}} So much damage and you feel so guilty if you give her the reset its like she's designed to make the opposite team rage
{{champion:53}} Hate this guy when he's on my team and the enemy team. On my team their ult will often steal farm and kills. And on the enemy team you have to have a tank in front of you at all times and every bush has to be warded else you will not be safe
{{champion:9}}  You never think his ult is up but it always is

{{champion:120}}  That pony will rape you 5 times over :c so tanky so much dmg aoe fear gets more damage with speed late game 1 shots your mid and adc if there in range of homeguard even when they only have a triforce and have built full tank. {{item:3070}} you just better hope you have {{summoner:4}}  up cause thats your only chance of escape.
{{champion:92}} > {{champion:114}} > {{champion:421}} > {{champion:55}} > {{champion:75}} > {{champion:429}}
My god I never get the chance to lane agaisnt those kinds of leonas.

Depends on what lane i'm playing. WARNING: SEMI BIG WALL OF TEXT INCOMING.

TOP LANE: I hate to see {{champion:17}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:92}}. It's not so much fear, as it is annoyance, because I main {{champion:75}} and {{champion:122}} top, and seeing those champions means that I wont be able to farm or be aggressive, because they all have escapes or out trade my Q for damage.

MID LANE: I loathe seeing {{champion:127}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}}. I like to play {{champion:103}} {{champion:157}} and {{champion:76}} mid. Lissandra takes a massive dump all over yasuo with her massive stun and burst, and does the same to ahri and nid. Azir I can never seem to get to as he's always behind his soldiers and that means taking a huge chunk of damage just to get into his face. Leblanc you can never touch, if she's a smart leblanc, and katarina has the highest burst damage in the game. If she roams and gets 1-2 kills, or if i %%%%up and die once, she will snowball into an unstoppable killing machine.

BOT LANE: I don't normally play this very much, so i'll only show the champs i hate seeing here and not go into depth. I dislike seeing: {{champion:119}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:1}}.

JUNGLE: If I see {{champion:421}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:102}} with smite, I pee myself a little. They all have lockdowns, dashes, knockups, CC whatever you wanna call it. They have "you stop now, i kill you trololol". Of course, I only play {{champion:19}} or {{champion:254}} in jungle, so i'm not scared of them when it comes to counterjungling, but if i'm in mid lane and I see one of those approaching, I've gotta hope i've got flash or i'm dead.

vladamir... this champ is just to over powered. amazing sustain in lane, no mana, spell vamp is ridiculous, that stupid pool... arrggggg hate that champ. the sustain is just to much come mid game when he has a spell vamp item :c
{{champion:8}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:8}}
Get {{item:3165}} if your AP and Executioner's Calling if you're AD, oh wait...
don't forget laundry's torment with that...
{{champion:114}}  She is scary when she ults there is no way to stop her only zhonha but only for ap though but far i hate her ulty!

As a {{champion:238}} main, I fear him the most, simply because I know his full potential and how much he can destroy games. Another champion not neccissarily most feared but most hated is without a doubt {{champion:17}}

{{champion:17}} 

This guy, because whenever I want to play an AA reliant top, like Shyv or Riven (not so much Riven, but her passive damage is huge) I am always laning against this guy. The blinds, and the poison, he pokes too hard, and I have to recall more times than Mazda
%%%%ing hate {{champion:74}}  but I hate {{champion:103}}  more when my team feeds and im {{champion:84}}
i %%%%ing hate seeing a black rectangle in loading screen
LEBLANC, as anyone in any lane.
in blinds I hate vsing a {{champion:85}} he is just so annoying
I don't recall seeing him on the enemy team before, what's he like ?
AFK IS OP NEFF AFK

Im a mid Laner, {{champion:268}} and {{champion:30}} main, and my blood runs cold when i see an {{champion:103}} or {{champion:238}} in the opposing team. but even more i just wanna stop playing when there is a {{champion:92}} or {{champion:86}} top, because they always get fed, even if our top is doing well, somehow they still get fed. and both deal mega damage and are just impossible to kill and catch.
{{champion:1}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:92}}
Personally as an adc main, {{champion:23}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:55}}  are my most feared. Cause I know they're out to get me. {{item:3070}}

Fiddlesticks, Shaco and Hecarim.

Fear the Fear.
at the moment mostly leblanc malz reksai gnar vi
